FlowGraph

Class ElementDto

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.Dtos
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Polymorphic element DTO base class for Version 2 format. Uses "kind" discriminator to identify element type.

[JsonDerivedType(typeof(NodeElementDto), "node")]
[JsonDerivedType(typeof(EdgeElementDto), "edge")]
[JsonDerivedType(typeof(ShapeElementDto), "shape")]
public abstract class ElementDto

Kind

Element kind discriminator (e.g., "node", "edge", "shape.rectangle"). Used by JsonDerivedType for polymorphic deserialization.

public required string Kind { get; set; }
